ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Packaged_connector_component is a type of and a type of that is an occurrence of a . Figure illustrates a member of Packaged_connector_component that is a socket.

the interface_access_mechanism is an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Packaged_connector_component is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Packaged_connector_component as its associated_component. There shall be one or more for a Packaged_connector_component.

A Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal is a type of . The Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal indicates explicitly that the object is an interface terminal of a connector and that the terminal will never be connected to the circuit board or substrate. In the context of system simulation and test, a Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal may represent a cabling or external connection interface. Further, it provides the exact geometric location of the terminal, whereby the exact geometric location of a mating terminal may be checked to determine whether the physical connection zones of the two interface terminals mate properly.
the associated_component specifies the role of the for the Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal.
the definition specifies the role of the for the Packaged_connector_component_interface_terminal.

An Interface_mounted_join is the relationship that specifies the connectivity between a terminal on a component and the terminal on a socket in the assembly that directly mates with that component terminal. An example of this relation is pin 1, a U1, an integrated circuit and a component, that is connected to pin 1, on XU1, a socket and an the IC is inserted into the socket in the assembly. This Application object is not referencing the terminal on the socket that mates with the base interconnect substrate. That is referenced by a member of Assembly_joint.
the access_to_interface_mounted_component specifies the of the being interfaced to the assembly by the specified by connection_to_interconnect_module_component for the Interface_mounted_join.
the connection_to_interconnect_module_component specifies the that mates with the specified by access_to_interface_mounted_component for the Interface_mounted_join. The is a terminal of the .
